questionText: In the IOTA Validator setup, what is the maximum voting power a single validator can hold, regardless of the amount staked?
How does a validator set the reference gas price for the next epoch?

answerOptions.answerText: By submitting a gas price quote during the gas price survey at the end of each epoch.
By manually adjusting the gas price in the fullnode configuration file.
By aggregating the previous epoch's gas prices from all validators.
By implementing a fixed gas price throughout the network.
